amendment.description: Amendment increases funding for Rural Energy for America by $2 million, offset by a $2 million reduction for the Office of the Chief Information Officer.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in part B of House Report 111-191 to increase funding for Rural Energy for America by $2 million, offset by a $2 million reduction for the Office of the Chief Information Officer.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fortenberry amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
